Title: Relates to prohibiting the transfer of incarcerated individuals during a public health emergency unless the incarcerated individual requests such transfer
Summary: Prohibits the transfer of incarcerated individuals during a public health emergency except where a correctional facility has an outbreak of a disease unless the incarcerated individual requests such transfer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting the transfer of incarcerated individuals during a public health emergency unless the incarcerated individual requests such transfer
